Schema.Name: health_system_name
Schema.Description: The name of the health system in the source system

Schema.Name: health_system_entity_code
Schema.Description: The Premier entity code for the health system

Schema.Name: direct_parent_name
Schema.Description: The Premier parent name for the health system

Schema.Name: direct_parent_entity_code
Schema.Description: The Premier parent entity code for the health system

Schema.Name: org_description
Schema.Description: The name for an organization in the health system.

Schema.Name: org_number
Schema.Description: The number assigned to an organization in the health system. This value may be a hospital-sized unit, larger, or smaller, depending on how the medical center is structured.

Schema.Name: facility_entity_name
Schema.Description: The Premier name for the facility

Schema.Name: facility_entity_code
Schema.Description: The Premier entity code for the facility

Schema.Name: invoice_header_id
Schema.Description: The internal ID used to identify a unique invoice in an ERP system

Schema.Name: remitra_invoice_header_id
Schema.Description: The internal ID used to identify a unique invoice in Remitra

Schema.Name: invoice_number
Schema.Description: The invoice document number provide by the invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: invoice_total_amount
Schema.Description: The total dollar amount listed on an invoice

Schema.Name: invoice_paid_amount
Schema.Description: The amount of the invoice that has been paid

Schema.Name: discount_taken_amount
Schema.Description: The amount discounted from the invoice based on discount and payment terms

Schema.Name: vendor_name
Schema.Description: The name of the vendor listed on the invoice

Schema.Name: vendor_number
Schema.Description: The unique number set up in the health system's ERP for the vendor providing the invoice

Schema.Name: premier_vendor_name
Schema.Description: The Premier cleansed name for the invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: vendor_entity_code
Schema.Description: The Premier entity code for the invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: vendor_top_parent_name
Schema.Description: The Premier cleansed name for the parent invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: vendor_top_parent_entity_code
Schema.Description: The Premier parent entity code for the invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: vendor_invoice_date
Schema.Description: The date listed on the invoice that was created by the invoicing vendor

Schema.Name: remitra_invoice_received_date
Schema.Description: The date that the invoice was received by Remitra

Schema.Name: remitra_invoice_sent_date
Schema.Description: The date the invoice was sent from Remitra to the provider

Schema.Name: invoice_received_date
Schema.Description: The date that the invoice was received from the vendor by the health system either in the ERP or Remitra.

Schema.Name: invoice_create_date
Schema.Description: This is the date that the invoice is created in the health system's ERP, unless it has not yet been imported, then it will reflect the date the invoice was received by Remitra

Schema.Name: invoice_due_date
Schema.Description: The due date for payment listed on the invoice

Schema.Name: approval_needed_date
Schema.Description: The date that invoice approval is required by

Schema.Name: approved_date
Schema.Description: The date that an invoice was approved for payment

Schema.Name: payment_posted_date
Schema.Description: The date that the payment was posted for an invoice

Schema.Name: check_date
Schema.Description: The date on the check for an invoice payment

Schema.Name: last_modified_date
Schema.Description: The date that the invoice header was last modified in the health system's ERP

Schema.Name: fiscal_period
Schema.Description: A 1-12 month indicator of the financial period varying based on a health system's defined fiscal year

Schema.Name: fiscal_year
Schema.Description: The financial year that the invoice transaction took place

Schema.Name: payment_terms
Schema.Description: The payment terms on the purchase order determining when final payment is due

Schema.Name: remitra_payment_terms
Schema.Description: The payment terms on the invoice stored by Remitra

Schema.Name: po_number
Schema.Description: The purchase order number linked to the invoice number

Schema.Name: po_header_id
Schema.Description: The internal ID used by the ERP system to identify a unique purchase order

Schema.Name: remitra_po_header_id
Schema.Description: The internal ID used by Remitra to identify a unique purchase order

Schema.Name: assigned_user_id
Schema.Description: The ERP userid assigned to an invoice after it has been created in the system

Schema.Name: create_user_id
Schema.Description: The ERP userid that created an invoice, if the invoice was created electronically, the user id will be EDI

Schema.Name: approval_user_id
Schema.Description: The userid assigned to approve an invoice for payment

Schema.Name: direct_approver
Schema.Description: The assigned approver for an invoice

Schema.Name: approver_group
Schema.Description: The approver group assigned to an invoice

Schema.Name: invoice_match_status_description
Schema.Description: The text string description of the numerical indicator for the review status of an invoice

Schema.Name: invoice_status_description
Schema.Description: A text string describing the current status of an invoice

Schema.Name: remitra_invoice_status_description
Schema.Description: A text string describing the current status of an invoice in Remitra's system

Schema.Name: invoice_create_type_description
Schema.Description: A text string description of how an invoice was created

Schema.Name: payment_method_description
Schema.Description: A text string description of the payment method including ACH payments, credit payments, and printed checks

Schema.Name: remitra_payment_method_description
Schema.Description: The payment method for an invoice documented by Remitra

Schema.Name: remitra_invoice_yn
Schema.Description: A yes (1) or no (0) indicator if the invoice was imported and transformed using optical character recognition to convert from a pdf or image to searchable text fields

Schema.Name: remitra_wf_invoice_yn
Schema.Description: Indicates if the invoice ever went into the Remitra workflow queue

Schema.Name: remitra_wf_modified_user
Schema.Description: The user who modified the invoice in the Remitra workflow queue

Schema.Name: remitra_wf_modified_date
Schema.Description: The date the invoice was last modified in the Remitra workflow queue

Schema.Name: remitra_wf_status_description
Schema.Description: Current status description of an invoice that when into the Remitra workflow queue

Schema.Name: invoice_has_active_exception_yn
Schema.Description: A yes (1) or no (0) indicator if the invoice is currently in an exception status

Schema.Name: invoice_had_exception_yn
Schema.Description: A yes (1) or no (0) indicator if, at any point, the invoice was in an exception status

Schema.Name: lines_with_price_exception
Schema.Description: A count of the number of lines on an invoice that had a price exception

Schema.Name: lines_with_quantity_exception
Schema.Description: A count of the number of lines on an invoice that had a quantity exception

Schema.Name: lines_with_receipt_exception
Schema.Description: A count of the number of lines on an invoice that had a receipt exception

Schema.Name: lines_missing_with_exception
Schema.Description: A count of the number of lines on an invoice that had a missing line exception

Schema.Name: lines_with_other_exception
Schema.Description: A count of the number of lines on an invoice that had an other exception type not currently accounted for by exception counts above, such as a tax exception

Schema.Name: remitra_discrepancy_count
Schema.Description: A count of the number of discrepancies identified by Remitra that were resolved prior to being sent to the customer

Schema.Name: touchless_invoice_yn
Schema.Description: A yes (1) or no (0) indicator if an invoice was able to go directly to approval without manual intervention

Schema.Name: touch_count
Schema.Description: A count of the number of times an invoice needed manual intervention to move to the next step in the workflow process

Schema.Name: rejection_count
Schema.Description: A count of the number of times an invoice was rejected

Schema.Name: exception_date
Schema.Description: The date that an EDI 810 invoice went into the exception queue

Schema.Name: edi_810_exception_yn
Schema.Description: A binary indicator if an invoice had an 810 exception

Schema.Name: import_exception_count
Schema.Description: A count of the number of times an invoice went into the 810 exception queue

Schema.Name: refresh_date
Schema.Description: The date that the view was last refreshed

Schema.Name: data_source
Schema.Description: The source system data being ERP, Remitra, or both

Description: This view contains a history of all ERP and Remitra invoices with details about exceptions, productivity, and workflow status. This view will be updated daily by 10 AM EST
